DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, open-label extension study designed to examine the long-term safety of pramlintide treatment in subjects with type 1 diabetes who have successfully completed treatment in the parent study 137-150.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Long-Term Safety of Pramlintide in Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: The subject has completed the full dosing period in Protocol 137150.
